name: i_am_lost.
description:
I, am lost. As I venture down the path of dark,
My footsteps echoes into the unknown.
When the scars of tomorrow leaves their mark,
Compassion is a virtue nowhere shown.

i_am_lost. represents the struggles of a person as they try to find their light amongst the darkness. Tearing themselves apart slowly, are they really who they are in the end if they're inside out?

Submitted with inspiration (also as a submission) for Global Game Jam 2021 "Lost and Found". 2D recursion was a concept I wanted to toy with for quite some time ago, so the project was never finished due to work and assignments. Slowly and surely, I finally got this chance to build it and submit for FFS.
